trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage"></xref> interface to create a message that acts as a method response on a remote object.
A <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse> is generated as a result of a method called on a remote object, and is used to return the results of the method call back to the caller.
The message includes a return value and `out` arguments.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interface.
<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse> contains remoting data at the end of the message sink.
A remoting server returns a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse> message to a client.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse"></xref> class from an array of remoting headers and a request message.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interface.
An array of remoting headers that contains key/value pairs.

This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse"></xref> fields for headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
A request message that acts as a method call on a remote object.
Gets the number of arguments passed to the method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the number of arguments passed to a method.
Gets an array of arguments passed to the method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the arguments passed to a method.
Gets the exception thrown during the method call, or `null` if the method did not throw an exception.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> thrown during the method call, or `null` if the method did not throw an exception.
Specifies an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.ExternalProperties> field is also accessible through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.Properties%2A> property.
Gets a method argument, as an object, at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The method argument as an object.
Gets the name of a method argument at a specified index.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The name of the method argument.

The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)"></xref> method is not implemented.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.GetObjectData%2A> method throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
Data for serializing or deserializing the remote object.
Context of a certain serialized stream.
Returns the specified argument marked as a `ref` parameter or an `out` parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The specified argument marked as a `ref` parameter or an `out` parameter.
Returns the name of the specified argument marked as a `ref` parameter or an `out` parameter.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The index of the requested argument.
The argument name, or `null` if the current method is not implemented.
Gets a value that indicates whether the method can accept a variable number of arguments.
The method belongs to a remote object.
`true` if the method can accept a variable number of arguments; otherwise, `false`.
Initializes an internal serialization handler from an array of remoting headers that are applied to a method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The value of the first header in the input array is the method name.
An array of remoting headers that contain key/value pairs.

This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse"></xref> fields for headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
An internal serialization handler.
Specifies an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> for the current method call.
Gets the <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodBase"></xref> of the called method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.MethodBase"></xref> of the called method.
Gets the name of the invoked method.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the invoked method.
Gets an object that contains the method signature.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the method signature.
Gets the number of arguments in the method call marked as `ref` or `out` parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> that represents the number of arguments in the method call marked as `ref` or `out` parameters.
Gets an array of arguments in the method call that are marked as `ref` or `out` parameters.
The method belongs to a remote object.
An array of type <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the arguments in the method call that are marked as `ref` or `out` parameters.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.Properties%2A> property returns the value of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.ExternalProperties> field.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
Gets the return value of the method call.
The method belongs to a remote object.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the return value of the method call.
Sets method information from serialization settings.
The method belongs to a remote object.
The data for serializing or deserializing the remote object.
The context of a certain serialized stream.
Gets the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the full type name of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the remote object on which the method call is being made.
The URI of a remote object.
